title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the tenth house amplifies ambition, public visibility, and career hunger for Leo ascendants. Desire for authority and recognition intensifies, often bringing sudden opportunities or rapid shifts in professional direction. Image and status matter greatly, but shortcuts can backfire. This phase rewards strategic innovation, media-savvy leadership, and calculated risks. When ethics guide ambition, Rahu delivers powerful rise without reputational instability.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong drive for success and status

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income tied to reputation and role

closing: This transit magnifies career ambition. With ethics and strategy, Rahu transforms visibility into lasting authority.
